63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:(the servant of the Prophet) When the Prophet (ﷺ) arrived (at Medina), there was not a single companion of the Prophet (ﷺ) who had grey and black hair except Abu Bakr, and he dyed his hair with Henna' and Katam (i.e. plants used for dying hair)

chapter.ara-name: باب هِجْرَةُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَصْحَابِهِ إِلَى الْمَدِينَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The emigration of the Prophet (ﷺ) to Al-Madina
